body_html: The first element of sys.path by default is the location of where the script was run so appending to the very front breaks that guarantee which could lead to issues if any other imported libraries assume the first element is the execution location. Making it insert at 1 would still mostly serve the same purpose and not have that issue. It'd have the downside though if the person ran the file from a directory named tools then things would not work out.
